The claim compares the number of deaths: medical misadventures" to firearm accidents both nationally and in Florida.
The source of the claim is attributed to: a lobbyist for the National Rifle Association (NRA), who cited statistics from a document called "Firearms Accidents Facts" compiled by the Unified Sportsmen of Florida.
The fact: sheet provided by the Unified Sportsmen of Florida compares accidental deaths by "medical misadventures" to other types of accidents, but does not specify the year of the data.
